description: This data was generated from Annotations obtained from the TCGA DCC in June 2016. This annotation data for TCGA patient cases includes the GDC case identifier. It may have slight differences from the annotations available at the GDC.

fields.description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; e.g. TCGA-OV, etc.
fields.name: project_short_name

fields.description: Barcode of the entity that this annotation applies to; often the same as the case barcode
fields.name: entity_barcode

fields.description: Type of the entity that this annotation applies to; e.g. Shipped Portion, Aliquot, Patient (which has the same meaning as Case), Analyte, etc.
fields.name: entity_type

fields.description: Annotation category; one of a relatively short list of phrases from a controlled-vocabulary; e.g. Item is noncanonical, Item flagged DNU, Prior malignancy, etc.
fields.name: category

fields.description: Annotation classification; e.g. Notification, CenterNotification, Observation, or Redaction
fields.name: classification

fields.description: Longer descriptive text about this annotation
fields.name: notes

fields.description: Date on which this annotation was originally created; includes time-stamp and time-zone, eg 2011-03-14T18:00:42-04:00  --  dates range between March 2009 and June 2016
fields.name: date_created

fields.description: Annotations were rarely edited, but if thery were (fewer than 10 out of over 6000 total annotations), this field indicates the date on which it was edited
fields.name: date_edited

fields.description: GDC case identifier for the patient/case associated with this specific annotation
fields.name: case_gdc_id

fields.description: TCGA sample barcode; e.g. TCGA-06-0119-01A (note that this field will be null if the annotation applies at a higher level than sample)
fields.name: sample_barcode

fields.description: TCGA aliquot barcode; e.g. TCGA-06-0119-01A-08D-0216-06 (note that this field will be null if the annotation applies at a higher level than aliquot)
fields.name: aliquot_barcode
